segments.text: I think that we have a pretty good idea of what we would like to order .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me tell you about the specials of the day , which are chicken in a wine sauce with capers , and grilled garlic shrimp .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was wondering if the chef could leave off the sauce .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The chef would be happy to accommodate your special requests .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am a vegetarian . Do you have any vegetarian selections ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You could choose the roasted vegetable and garlic pizza or the goat cheese and candied walnut salad .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that we will split the roasted vegetable and garlic pizza .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is a good selection , and I can bring your salads now or serve them with your entree .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can bring us our salads when you bring us our entree .
segments.speaker: S2
